name: Rotary World (Weekly Game Jam 193)
description:
A platformer based off turning things!

Some floors slide, some floors turn, some do both. Some wait for you to move first, and others move all the time. You'll have to strategize to find the fastest way, with the fewest turns taken!

Keyboard Controls:

-A/D (or Left/Right arrow keys) to rotate clockwise/counterclockwise.

^Can be inverted in the settings

-Hold W To charge a jump, and Release W to activate a jump.

^Jumps can be cancelled by pressing the Space bar, then releasing W/Up-Arrow

Touch Controls can be activated in the Settings menu.

- Rotation buttons on the bottom left/right of the screen.

-Jump button dead center. Press & Hold to charge, release to jump.

^Dragging your finger away from the jump button while holding will cancel the jump
